title: Presidential Nominations Sent To The Senate, 5-1-09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 01, 2009

 



Presidential Nominations Sent To The Senate, 5-1-09




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  __________________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                            May 1, 2009   NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:   Herbert M. Allison, Jr., of Connecticut, to be an Assistant Secretary of the Treasury. (New Position)   Michael S. Barr, of Michigan, to be an Assistant Secretary of the Treasury, vice David George Nason, resigned.   ##
